product_name: Gerber Bear Grylls Field Knife Sharpener
long_description: The durable Gerber Bear Grylls field knife sharpener is encased in a hard plastic cover that fits easily in your pocket. It may be the only sharpener you'll ever need for your outdoor adventures. 2 diamond-coated sharpeners allow you to sharpen serrated edges; coarse carbide and fine ceramic inserts will get your fine edge blade in shape. Grippy rubber handle helps ensure a secure grasp when your hands are wet and cold. The Gerber Bear Grylls field knife sharpener comes with a Priorities of Survival guide.
short_description: The durable Gerber Bear Grylls field knife sharpener is encased in a hard plastic cover that fits easily in your pocket. It may be the only sharpener you'll ever need for your outdoor adventures.
